issue.title: [Java] Fix overflow related corner cases for vector value comparison
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8392](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8392). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
1. Fix corner cases related to overflow.
2. Provide test cases for the corner cases.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8392?focusedCommentId=17080218) by Liya Fan (fan_li_ya):*
Hi Martin Janda, do you want to provide a patch for this issue?
